About Me.


Hello,

My name is Wesley.

I study Computer Science & Neuroscience

at Brandeis University

I love technogy and see a future filled with

Intelligent Machines

that make our everyday lives more exciting and meaningful.

I want to be part of that intelligent with my strong background in

Software Engineering

Machine Learning

& Cognitive Science

Experiences

3D Device Mockups
by PSDCovers

Turn your 2D designs into high quality, 3D product shots in seconds using free Photoshop actions by [PSDCovers](http://www.psdcovers.com/)! Visit their website to download some of their awesome, free photoshop actions!
